name: Somnia: Fantasy RPG
description:
Unique roleplaying game that will test your memory, wits and reflexes! Explore the world, defeat monsters and solve riddles to improve your character.

Play the main story line or conquer randomly generated worlds in a quest for the ultimate power. Can you survive the cold northern tundra and the blazing hot deserts of the south? Are you brave enough to enter keeps of long forgotten kings? Play now to find out!
